task.instruction: You are Lisa Nguyen with email ID 'lisa.nguyen@company.com', and you want to create a new page with the title 'API Project Documentation - Part 3' in the space that has the homepage with ID '7' and is of type 'global', the content must be the same as that found on the original page with ID '131' and the formatting content must be the same as that found on the oldest version of the page with ID '174', finally you need to add an attachment from the original version of the page with ID '69' to this new page. After the content and the attachment are secured, delete the original page with ID '131'.

output.name: PlatinumSys Space

output.title: Technical Documentation - Part 106
output.content:
